name: Super Mario World: The Megaman 29th Anniversary Adventure
overview: 2016 is celebrated the 29th Megaman Anniversary, however, something terrible had happened: The Five Evil Dastardly Bombers (the Villains that appeared in Super Bomberman 2, Super Bomberman 3 and Bomberman Tournament) ruined the party kidnapping the six Megamen and trapped them in the Dastardly Bombers Fortresses. It’s revealed that there are a Mastermind pulling the threads of these evil Bombermen. It’s up to Mario save the Megamen and the Party.
